Text: CIPCO Storage Letter Agreementpst i think this is the latest so lets work off thisi will call after i talk with legal Forwarded by Greg A SwidenskyHoustonPEFSPEC on PM Michael S Richards To cc Greg A EC Subject CIPCO Storage Letter Agreement PM Shemin attached below is your last draft of the letter agreement with our additional comments Some of the comments we previously discussed on the phone I understand my business person is having discussions with Enron management to try and resolve a number of issues with Enron Therefore the results of those discussions may cause additional comments from us to this Letter Agreement In addition my business person is currently out of the office so these comments are subject to his review and additional changes We are fine with the Escrow Agreement as long as it is understood that Enron will pay all costs associated with the Escrow Agreement See attached file StorageLeaseLetterAgreementDOC
cipco storage obligations draft letter proposalpst here you joelet me know what your comments are See attached file StorageLeaseLettterAgreedoc See attached file StorageLeaseRevisionsdoc
